SEARCH
Package Presentation.Controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements ActionListener
Controller class responsible for handling user actions in the game view.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(MainControllerEvent mc, GameView gameView, GameManager gameManager)
      Default constructor for the class GameController.
      Parameters:
      mc - Interface in charge of letting the main controller know when a view needs to be changed onto another.
      gameView - View of the game.
      gameManager - Manager in charge of the logic, specially when talking with the database is necessary.
